name: 901505-Plump Party
description:
Plump Party! Eat the loops, get plump, score high!

Eat the loops to score points and get plump, avoid the spoons (they deduct points and plumpness), avoid the weetabix otherwise its game over.

Everything within this game was created by me except for the sounds which can be found and credited at https://freesound.org/

These are the tutorial videos that I used to help me make this game:
